Moreno, A
Lamarca, J
metadata.dc:description: We report a case of leiomyosarcoma arising in smooth muscle of scrotum (Dartros muscle). Morphological findings are similar to leiomyosarcomas in other sites. Because of deep location of smooth muscle in scrotal skin, scrotal leiomyosarcomas are deep located tumors lacking the indolent course described in pure dermal leiomyosarcoma.
metadata.dc:title: Leiomiosarcoma escrotal.
[Scrotal leiomyosarcoma].
